text: Isaac Correia da Costa (born 25 April 1991) is an Angolan footballer who plays for C.D. Primeiro de Agosto and the Angola national football team. ==International career== Isaac made his senior international debut on 3 June 2012 in a world cup qualification 1-1 home draw against Cameroon. ==Honors== ===Club=== ;Primeiro de Agosto *Girabola Champion: 2018 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Atlético Petróleos de Luanda players Category:C.D. Primeiro de Agosto players Category:Girabola players Category:Angolan footballers Category:Angola international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Luanda Category:2019 Africa Cup of Nations players
title: Isaac Costa
